===============

### Tender Announcement
=====================

#### Title and Reference Number
---------------------------

* Title: Acquisition of a turnkey laboratory scale SWIR hyperspectral imaging system
* Reference Number: WS3734621952

#### Overview
-------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) for the acquisition of a complete SWIR hyperspectral imaging system for laboratory scale use. The proposed system shall include options and be delivered to Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada.

#### Background
-------------

This RFP cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 01B46-230489, dated November 10, 2022, with a closing date of November 29, 2022 at 14:00 HNE (Eastern Standard Time). Bidders who submitted proposals in response to the previous solicitation may request a debriefing or feedback session.

#### Request for Proposal
------------------------

This RFP invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the acquisition of a complete laboratory scale SWIR hyperspectral imaging system, including options and delivery. The RFP includes detailed information regarding the system requirements, specifications, and evaluation criteria. Suppliers are required to submit all necessary supporting documentation and bid forms by 14:00 HNE on February 22, 2023. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

#### Evaluation and Award
-------------------------

The RFP will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the solicitation documents. The evaluation process will be conducted in accordance with the Government of Canada's policies and procedures. The successful supplier will be awarded a contract for the acquisition of the laboratory scale SWIR hyperspectral imaging system.

#### Important Dates
-------------------

* Publication Date: January 30, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 22, 2023, 14:00 HNE
* Tender Status: Expired
